price: Dhugumatti, kana keessa namoota adabbii Aakiraa sodaataniif mallattootu jira. Sun guyyaa namoonni isaaf walitti qabamaniidha; sun guyyaa dhufamaadhas.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّمَنۡ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّجۡمُوعٞ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّشۡهُودٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan liman khāfa ʿadhāba al-ākhirati dhālika yawmun majmūʿun lahu al-nāsu wadhālika yawmun mashhūdun
